name: Kaplow - An 80s Classic Reborn
description:
You are bomb squad special agent Dudley and your mission is to protect this building from the evil villain Smoke. Use your touch screen to move Agent Dudley left and right, catching the bombs before they blow!

A throw back to the classic spinner games of the eighties. This game is similar to the retro classic Kaboom by Atari. If you are into the old school games, where high score is king, this game is for you.
